keywords.coffee: The campus coffee bar is open from 9 AM to 7 PM and serves a variety of beverages and snacks.
keywords.library: The library is open from 8 AM to 9 PM daily. Please bring your student ID to access library services.
keywords.admissions: You can contact admissions at admissions@thebritishcollege.edu.np or call +977 1-5970003.
keywords.sports: The sports facilities include a gym and a multipurpose court, open from 7 AM to 8 PM. Join our sports clubs to stay active!
keywords.courses: We offer undergraduate, postgraduate, and short professional courses. Visit thebritishcollege.edu.np/programmes for details.
keywords.fees: Tuition fees vary by program. Visit thebritishcollege.edu.np/fees or contact the finance office for detailed information.
keywords.hostel: Hostel accommodations are available nearby the campus. Contact student services at hostel@thebritishcollege.edu.np for more information.
keywords.scholarships: The British College provides merit-based and need-based scholarships. Visit thebritishcollege.edu.np/scholarships to learn more.
keywords.events: Stay updated with campus events on the college events page at thebritishcollege.edu.np/events.
keywords.transport: The college provides transportation services from major areas in Kathmandu. Contact admin for details and schedules.
keywords.wifi: Campus WiFi, 'TBCNet', is accessible 24/7. Use your student ID credentials to connect.
keywords.parking: Limited parking is available for students. Contact the administration office to apply for a parking permit.
keywords.food: The cafeteria offers a mix of local and international cuisines. It's open from 8 AM to 7 PM.
keywords.exam: Exam schedules and guidelines are posted at thebritishcollege.edu.np/exams. Best of luck, {user_name}!
keywords.orientation: New student orientation will be held in the main conference hall on Monday at 10 AM.
keywords.clubs: We have a variety of student clubs, including Debate, Drama, Music, and Tech. Visit thebritishcollege.edu.np/clubs to join.
keywords.internships: Career services can assist you with internships. Visit the Career Hub or go to thebritishcollege.edu.np/careers for more info.
keywords.faculty: Our faculty profiles and contact details are available at thebritishcollege.edu.np/faculty.
keywords.support: Need help? Student support services are available at thebritishcollege.edu.np/support or visit the help desk on campus.
keywords.health: The health center is open from 9 AM to 5 PM. For emergencies, contact the student services office.
keywords.fitness: The fitness center is open from 7 AM to 8 PM. Join group fitness classes to stay in shape!
